Text:
nice very soothing songs....
sad he is no more:(

Gone but not forgotten.

Goodbye Bob.

miss you bob,

i got to know bob pretty good , he always put a smile on my face.he loved his grand daughter very much.from what i gather he was the biggest 2040 fan around next to me ..lol.see you when i get bob..

your friend
cv

lilars....gone...didnt know him personally but did see his comments often...he stuck with you, 2040 thru tough times...so he must have been a good human being..god bless his soul..sorry about ur loss..

Friends are where you find them. I will miss his comments .I think lilars was from
my neck of the woods as he said to me one time and his real name is familar to me, as a comunity of 20-40 fans we 
read and listen to each other. A part
of our conversation is stilled but not forgotten.
I did not know lilars but always noticed his comments, it's nice that you created this i'm sure he would appreciate it, R.I.P Lilars
